  • Method Details

    • create_cos_sin_tables

      public static void create_cos_sin_tables​(singleSpin[] arr, int Lz, int Lx, double[][] k_cos_table, double[][] k_sin_table)
      Fills the sin and cos tables for mk^2
      Parameters:
      arr - the array of single spins of the system
      Lz - # of unit cells in the z direction
      Lx - # of unit cells in the x and y directions
      k_cos_table - table to be filled with cos(k.R) for each site R in each direction k (k_x,k_y,k_z)
      k_sin_table - table to be filled with sin(k.R) for each site R in each direction k (k_x,k_y,k_z)

    • initializeMultipleRNG

      @Deprecated public static long[] initializeMultipleRNG​(org.apache.commons.math3.random.MersenneTwister[] rndArr, int taskID)
      Deprecated.
      RNGs are initialized in main(String[])
      Initializes an array of MersenneTwister random number generators
      Parameters:
      rndArr - array of RNGs to initialize
      taskID - to use as part of the seed for RNGs
      Returns:
      the seeds used to initialize the RNGs
      See Also:
      GenerateSeeds.generateSeeds(RandomGenerator, int)

    • initializeRNG

      @Deprecated public static long initializeRNG​(org.apache.commons.math3.random.MersenneTwister rnd, int taskID)
      Deprecated.
      RNGs are initialized in main(String[])
      Initializes a single MersenneTwister random number generator
      Parameters:
      rnd - RNG to initialize
      taskID - to use as part of the seed
      Returns:
      the used seeds
      See Also:
      GenerateSeeds.generateSeeds(RandomGenerator, int)

    • receiveTemperatureSchedule

      public static double[] receiveTemperatureSchedule​(String fname)
      Read a temperature schedule from the given file
      Parameters:
      fname - name of the file from which the temperature schedule should be read
      Returns:
      array of temperatures to simulate

    • makeDir

      public static void makeDir​(String path, String dirName)
      Makes a new directory if one does not already exist
      Parameters:
      path - in which to create the new directory with trailing separator char
      dirName - name of the new directory

    • generateEquilibrationQueues

      @Deprecated public static ArrayList<ArrayList<org.apache.commons.collections4.queue.CircularFifoQueue<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Double,​Double>>>> generateEquilibrationQueues​(int numOfBins, int numOfTemperatures, int numOfObservables)
      Deprecated.
      since equilibration is no longer tracker in real time
      Creates a queue that can hold the last x bin averages and standard errors and be used to determine equilibration ("last 3 bins for all observables agree within error bars")
      Parameters:
      numOfBins - number of the last bins to keep in the queue
      numOfTemperatures - number of temperatures to track
      numOfObservables - number of observables to track
      Returns:
      a queue that can hold the averages and STEs from the last X bins for all temperatures and observables

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Runs the Monte Carlo simulation
      Parameters:
      args - arguments parsed using ParseCommandLine
